word:
The Lord will work with power, as we strive to do our part faithfully, He will cause Boston to hear the message of present truth. Cooperate with Him in bringing this about, my brother, my sister, and He will help you, strengthen you, and encourage your hearts through the salvation of many precious souls. Ms 59, 1908, p. 15. ("The New England Sanitarium," 1908.) 

White Estate Washington, D.C. September 23, 1945
